text: Philip Baker Hall (September 10, 1931 – June 12, 2022) was an American actor. He starred in Paul Thomas Anderson's movies, Hard Eight, Boogie Nights and Magnolia. Other movies included Air Force One, The Truman Show, Bruce Almighty, Rush Hour and The Amityville Horror. Hall was born in Toledo, Ohio. He studied at the University of Toledo.Philip Baker Hall Biography – Yahoo! Movies He was married three times, but two ended in divorce. Hall had four children. Hall died on June 12, 2022 of emphysema at his home in Glendale, California at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from Toledo, Ohio Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from emphysema
title: Philip Baker Hall
